column2: PRIVACY POLICY Freedom Communications, Inc. (Freedom) has agreed to sell the assets of the Lima News, Sedalia Democrat, Jacksonville Journal Courier and Alton Telegraph (the Properties) to an affiliate of Ohio Community Media, an Ohio-based publisher of community newspapers. This affiliate, called Testor FCI Acquisition, LLC (Publisher), plans to continue the Properties operations uninterrupted after the sale to provide readers with high quality local news services.

PRIVACY POLICY Freedom Communications, Inc. (Freedom) has agreed to sell the assets of the Lima News, Sedalia Democrat, Jacksonville Journal Courier and Alton Telegraph (the Properties) to an affiliate of Ohio Community Media, an Ohio-based publisher of community newspapers. This affiliate, called Testor FCI Acquisition, LLC (Publisher), plans to continue the Properties operations uninterrupted after the sale to provide readers with high quality local news services.

Customer data transferred to Publisher will be held and maintained by Publisher pursuant to Publishers respective privacy policies, which can be found at the following: http://lima.ohcommedia.com, http://sedalia.ohcommedia.com, http://jacksonville.ohcommedia.com and http://alton.ohcommedia.com.

We respect your privacy and appreciate the confidence you have placed in the Site. We are committed to protecting your privacy and preserving your trust. Please carefully review this Privacy Policy to learn about how we collect, use, and protect any personal information you provide us and your choices for managing your personal information. This Privacy Policy is subject to the User Agreement posted on the Site.
